title: Watch live: Ontario premier to make COVID-19-related announcement - CTV News
description: Watch live: Ontario premier to make COVID-19-related announcement CTV News Coronavirus: Ontario launches online portal to recruit health-care workers Global News Coronavirus: Latest developments in the Greater Toronto Area on April 7 Global News First Ontario…
content: TORONTO The Ontario government is calling for all hands on deck and is asking anyone with a medical background to step forward in an effort to fight the COVID pandemic Speaking at Queens Park on Tuesday alongside Minister of Health Christine Elliot chars
